results.name: Number of binary right-rotations (iterations of A038572) to reach fixed point.
comment: a(n) = 0 when n is a fixed point of form 2^k-1 left-rotation analog appears to be same as A048881.
formula: If n+1 is a power of 2 then a(n)=0 otherwise a(n) = 1 + a(floor(n/2)).
In other words, a(n) = 1 + a(floor(n/2)) - A036987(n) for n>0 with a(0)=0. - _Mikhail Kurkov_, Jul 17 2019
example: a(11)=3 since under right-rotation 11 -> 13 -> 14 -> 7 and 7 is a fixed point.
program: print([a(n) for n in range(105)]) # _Indranil Ghosh_, May 25 2017
